issue.message: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.

Apps that use Firebase Cloud Messaging should implement `onNewToken()` in order to observe token changes

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

issue.message: `@id/toolbarTitleTv` can overlap `@id/toolbarProfileIv` if @id/toolbarTitleTv grows due to localized text expansion
`@id/profileImagePickFab` can overlap `@id/profileIv` if @id/profileImagePickFab grows due to localized text expansion
`@id/dateTimeTv` can overlap `@id/nameTv` if @id/nameTv, @id/dateTimeTv grow due to localized text expansion
Inconsistent alignment specification between `textAlignment` and `gravity` attributes: was `left`, expected `center_horizontal`
Consider replacing `android:layout_marginLeft` with `android:layout_marginStart="24dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Consider replacing `android:layout_marginRight` with `android:layout_marginEnd="25dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Use "`start`" instead of "`left`" to ensure correct behavior in right-to-left locales
